meanings.definition: The state or quality of being dirty or grimy.
meanings.sent1: The grubbinesses of the old abandoned house made it look neglected.
meanings.sent2: I had to clean up the grubbinesses in the kitchen before my parents came home.
meanings.sent3: The grubbinesses on the dog's fur made it look like it had rolled in mud.
meanings.sent4: The grubbinesses of the city streets reflected the neglect of the local government.
meanings.sent5: The grubbinesses of the public restroom was so off-putting that I decided to hold it until I got home.

meanings.definition: Actions or behaviors that are unclean or messy.
meanings.sent1: The children's grubbinesses after playing in the mud were a clear sign of their fun day.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't stand the grubbinesses of her roommate's habits anymore.
meanings.sent3: The grubbinesses of the toddler's face after eating chocolate cake was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent4: The grubbinesses of his lies were evident in the inconsistencies of his story.
meanings.sent5: The grubbinesses of the office politics made it difficult for anyone to trust each other.
